required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Retrospective Chart Review to Evaluate Safety and Tolerability of ADVATE Among Previously Untreated Patients in China With Moderate to Severe Hemophilia A
clinical_study.official_title: Retrospective Chart Review to Evaluate Safety and Tolerability of ADVATE Among Previously Untreated Patients in China With Moderate to Severe Hemophilia A

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this post-marketing safety study is to evaluate the safety, immunogenicity, and effectiveness of ADVATE in previously untreated patients (PUPs) in China with moderate to severe hemophilia A.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of high titer, low titer and transient Factor VIII (FVIII) inhibitors developed
primary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period of 6 months

primary_outcome.measure: Number and type of other serious and non-serious adverse events (AEs)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period of 6 months
primary_outcome.description: Other AEs refers to AEs other than Factor VIII (FVIII) inhibitors

secondary_outcome.measure: Number and type of bleeding episodes treated with ADVATE
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period of 6 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of bleeding episodes treated with 1, 2, 3, â‰¥ 4 infusions of ADVATE
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period of 6 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Annualized bleeding rate (ABR) of participants treated prophylactically and on-demand with ADVATE
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period of 6 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Annualized joint bleeding rate (AJBR) of participants treated prophylactically and on-demand with ADVATE
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period of 6 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Total number of exposure days (EDs) to ADVATE
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period of 6 months
Throughout the study period of 6 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Total number of exposure days (EDs) to all Factor VIII (FVIII) products
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period of 6 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Total units of all Factor VIII (FVIII) products administered
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study period of 6 months

arm_group.description: PUPs in China with Moderate to Severe Hemophilia A

intervention.intervention_name: Octocog alfa (recombinant human coagulation factor VIII)

study_pop.textblock: Previously untreated patients (PUPs) in China with moderate to severe hemophilia A.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Previously untreated patient (PUP) in China with moderate to severe hemophilia A.
2. Investigator prescribed ADVATE as the predominant therapeutic agent for the management of hemophilia A
3. Informed consent form from patient and/or legal representative will need to be signed per local regulation
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Presence of an inherited or acquired hemostatic defect other than hemophilia A, and any other clinically significant chronic disease
2. Participants who participated in another investigational FVIII drug study, or had participated in any clinical study involving an investigational FVIII drug during the course of the observation period

facility.name: Institute of Hematology and Oncology, Harbin The First Hospital
Tongji Hospital, Tongji Medical College of Huazhong University of Science & Technology
Nanjing Children's Hospital Affiliated to Nanjing Medical University
